name: I Wish
description:
Control a Magical Genie on a fight against a swarm of Scarabs, while your fool Master Human makes wishes out of control.

He can transform you into a Chicken, a Salamander or back to your Genie form.

Each form has its own pros and cons, which will also depend on the size that was desired by your Master Human.

Get the highest score as possible by defeating Scarabs, helping your Master on collecting Magical Lamps, and proving that you can deal with whatever your Master wishes.

Team:

Sound Designer - Alex Baluh

Artist - Rogério Narciso

Coder & Game Designer - Ruhan Bello
